Example
Brian Winston, Partner
www.example.com | 123.345.234

Begin forwarded message:
On Sunday, Jun 14, 2015 at 4:10 PM, Trevor Crane <trevor@trevorcranegroup.com>, wrote:

Hi ,

My name is Trevor Crane and I am reaching out to introduce myself to see if a quick conversation would be of interest. 

I help service-based business professionals, consultants, coaches, authors & speakers, dramatically increase their sales and help them create a predictable and duplicable sales system (typically within 30 to 60 days) so they can make more sales to their ideal client, increase revenue and accelerate their bottom line results. 

Over the past year, my team and I have helped our clients earn more than $13 million in bottom line profits. 

My work truly impacts the bottom line of my clients. My interest in reaching out to you today is because I suspect I may be able to help you accelerate and improve your results. 

I provide a complimentary coaching session as a way for us to get to know one another and see if working together further would be of interest. 

Those who have the best success with me:

1. Are in the professional services space, 

  ie. Coach, Consultant, Speaker, Author, Real Estate, Financial Services, Health & Wellness, etc.

2. Want or need to double their personal income in the next 1 to 2 years

3. Could be better at closing the deal over the phone, in person or in a presentation

4. Need a better process to quickly convert high end clients

5. Need better leads so they can attract more ideal clients, and fire those that suck

If this seems like i t could be of interest let’s schedule 10 to 15 minutes to dig a little deeper and see if me providing a free consultation would make sense as a next step. I look forward to connecting. Let me know a couple times and dates that work for you.

Best,

Trevor


___________________


Trevor Crane

Founder & CEO, Step Up Strategies

Business Growth Expert & Sales Strategist


#1 Bestselling Author of High Paying Clients

Host of the TV Show Greatness Quest


Mobile: (561) 601-9871 (text is ok) 

Email: trevor@trevorcranegroup.com 


LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/trevorcrane | Website: www.trevorcrane.com
